addEmptyRows

public void addEmptyRows(java.lang.String term,
                         javax.swing.JFrame frame)
Adds two empty rows between two different dates of the exam.

removeEmptyRows

public void removeEmptyRows(java.lang.String term,
                            javax.swing.JFrame frame,
                            boolean message)
Removes empty rows. 2 cases: a row is null or the first cell in the row (with id number) is blank.

Parameters:
term - the term part of the file name
frame - frame for the message dialog
message - if true then the message will pop up
